title: Angular 2 vs. Angular 1: Key Differences
desc: There are some key difference between Angular 1 and Angular 2. Angular 2 is written entirely in Typescript and meets the ECMAScript 6 specification. And Component-based development and object orientation are much easier for Angular 2.
name: angular1vs2
